item.title: A little bit about CI/CD and Jenkins
item.description: I don’t really feel like making a huge introduction to this post. I will just talk a little bit about what I studied today. If you have already read Jenkins documentation you can probably skip this, I just wanted to explain it to myself. What is CI/CD? CI CI stands for Continuous Integration and for that you basically merge your code into a main branch as often as possible. This way it’s easier to detect bugs and you can fix them before they get to production.
